contentSequences.description: Horizontal row of 6 category links with icons (Phones & devices, Phone plans, Internet, Voice, Bundles, Deals)
Large centered heading 'Great deals and the latest tech for your business'
Grid of 3 promotional cards - each with label tag, heading, description, fine print, and CTA button (iPhone 17 Pro offer, Wireless plans offer, Business internet offer)

sections.name: Dynamic Defense Section
sections.styling: two-column layout, image right, content left

contentSequences.description: Eyebrow text 'AT&T Dynamic Defense', large heading, paragraph description, disclaimer text, two CTA buttons
Award recognition text about J.D. Power 8-year customer satisfaction award with fine print
Centered heading 'Why work with AT&T Business?' with subheading
Grid of 4 feature items - each with heading, description paragraph, and 'Learn more' link (AT&T Guarantee, Reliability of fiber and 5G, Security that starts at the network, Experts who know business)

sections.name: Products and Services Section
sections.styling: eyebrow + heading centered, horizontal scrollable cards

contentSequences.description: Eyebrow 'Tools for success', heading 'Explore AT&T Business products and services', subheading paragraph
Horizontal carousel of 5+ product category cards - each with icon, heading, description, Learn more link (Wireless, Internet, Voice and collaboration, Cybersecurity, Network services)

sections.name: Solutions for Business Section
sections.styling: heading area left, carousel cards right

contentSequences.description: Eyebrow 'Solutions for every kind of business', paragraph description
Horizontal carousel of 4 solution cards with images - each with icon/image, heading, description (Small business, FirstNet, Public sector, Industry solutions)

sections.name: AT&T Guarantee Section
sections.styling: two-column layout, content left, image right

contentSequences.description: Large heading 'Get backed by the AT&T Guarantee', paragraph, checklist of 3 benefits with checkmarks, two CTA buttons (Shop deals, Learn more)
Heading 'Success stories from our customers', Read more link

sections.name: Contact Sales Section
sections.styling: two-column layout, text left, form right

contentSequences.description: Heading 'Talk to an AT&T Business sales expert', paragraph with phone number link, hours text
Contact form with fields: First name, Last name, Email, Phone, Company name, Comment, checkbox for marketing opt-in, Submit button
Grid of 4 columns of links - approximately 8 links per column covering various product and service categories
